title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When attempting to copy a package in the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' plugin, the destination is shown as 'jdt.ui3'.
OB: When copying a package in the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' plugin, the destination is shown as 'jdt.ui3'.
EB: The destination should be displayed as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' plugin 
2. Select the package you want to copy 
3. Right-click and select the 'Copy' option 
4. Paste the package into the desired location 
5. Observe that the destination is displayed as 'jdt.ui3' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
